name: Corny Shooter
description:
Top down shooter created in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

All of the art was created by us, around 95% of the script is original and was written during the jam.

Sound and music used are royalty free assets downloaded from:

Music: Lion Free Music https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRI6l4c1WUQpstPdbPaXw7A

Sounds: Zapsplat https://www.zapsplat.com/

*For Windows build only*

ESC closes the program.
